docs.snippet: In the span of just a few hours on a hot Tuesday afternoon, Terrance Gore drove from Arkansas to Kansas City, moved into a locker deep within Kauffman Stadium, slid into a starched white Royals jersey and took some bunting practice on the field....
docs.lead_paragraph: In the span of just a few hours on a hot Tuesday afternoon, Terrance Gore drove from Arkansas to Kansas City, moved into a locker deep within Kauffman Stadium, slid into a starched white Royals jersey and took some bunting practice on the field.

headline.main: September Call-Ups Have Purpose for These Royals

docs.snippet: The Chinese film "Red Amnesia" shown in Venice is partly a ghost story that may or may not have a ghost, but its portrayal of how the Cultural Revolution left a trail of twisted lives that haunts China today is unambiguous and devastating....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Chinese film "Red Amnesia" shown in Venice is partly a ghost story that may or may not have a ghost, but its portrayal of how the Cultural Revolution left a trail of twisted lives that haunts China today is unambiguous and devastating.

headline.main: Ghosts of China's Maoist Past Haunt Present in Venice Film

docs.snippet: The financial boost that accompanies a Super Bowl victory can quickly disappear, one reason the Seahawks are taking nothing for granted....
docs.lead_paragraph: The financial boost that accompanies a Super Bowl victory can quickly disappear, one reason the Seahawks are taking nothing for granted.
docs.abstract: Reigning Super Bowl champions Seattle Seahawks, who open 2014-2015 NFL season against Green Bay Packers, are on a mission to prove that last season was no fluke.

headline.seo: Seattle Seahawks Cashing In on Super Bowl Victory

docs.snippet: Complex Internet-to-TV setups have long discouraged many from doing away with their cable, but the technology is finally becoming more approachable....
docs.lead_paragraph: Complex Internet-to-TV setups have long discouraged many from doing away with their cable, but the technology is finally becoming more approachable.
docs.abstract: Molly Wood Machine Learning column examines promising new devices from TiVo and Roku that are making it far easier than before to discard cable service in favor of Internet-to-TV setups.

headline.main: New Roku and TiVo Devices Make Cutting the Cable Cord Plausible
headline.print_headline: New Devices Make Breaking Free From Cable Cord Easier

docs.snippet: With movies like “Nightcrawler,” the Toronto International Film Festival finds its sweet spot among slightly complex would-be crowd pleasers....
docs.lead_paragraph: With movies like “Nightcrawler,” the Toronto International Film Festival finds its sweet spot among slightly complex would-be crowd pleasers.
docs.abstract: Toronto International Film Festival's 2014 lineup is epitomized by films like Nightcrawler, starring Jake Gyllenhaal; festival does not usually feature typical awards fare playing for Oscar watchers, but caters more to slightly complex would-be crowd pleasers that need early attention and need to be nurtured by true movie fans.

headline.seo: 'Nightcrawler' With Jake Gyllenhaal, Epitomizes Toronto Film Festival Fare
headline.main: Toronto Films Lurk in the Dark Heart of Los Angeles
